column5: Downstairs private bedroom with on suite and queen size bed. Private entrance through garage. Access to upstairs amenities including mini fridge, microwave, & keurig coffee maker. TV in your bedroom and wifi access. Less than a 1/4 mile walk to Historic Downtown Grapevine. Also 1.4 mile walk or bike ride to the Gaylord Texan Resort.
column8: Gas Lantern Inn Grapevine, TX I
